description:
Tomobiki Town gets hit with a snowstorm in the middle of spring! Why? Well, it might have something to do with Ataru`s current bout of amnesia and the mysterious girl he ran into the other day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: From the Far Spring! The Tale of the Lonely Fairy!
春遠からじ! さびしがり屋の妖精物語!!
